Stadium - Class in sportstournament.main
This class implements a Stadium where the player can see 3 matches and select which one they want to play

start() - Method in class sportstournament.ui.CommandLine
starts the main game run loop where the user selects the action they want to perform terminates when no more weeks are remaining

Starts the match
startMatch(Club, Team) - Method in class sportstournament.main.Stadium

subAthlete(Athlete, Athlete) - Method in class sportstournament.main.Club
Takes an Athlete who is in the reserves and an Athlete from the active team and adds the reserve to the active team and the active Athlete to the reserves.
swapPositions(int, int) - Method in class sportstournament.main.Club
takes two indices of athletes in active team and swaps their position in the list this allows the user to change the athletes positions
